item.title: What is LouderVoice V2 all about?
item.description: We quietly launched V2 of our LouderVoice on the night before the Irish Blog Awards and have been tweaking for a few weeks. There is a lot more to come but we thought it’d be good to let you know what has changed now since we have a few more announcements coming in the next few days. The main aim with V2 was to make the activity on the site much more visible to the users and provide more opportunities to interact with others on the site.
